thumb.title: メガロドンを絶滅させたのはホホジロザメだった？！
thumb.description: ◆YouTubeチャンネル(生物解説)登録https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCprhlFj3cWC7d5Navri7Qow?sub_confirmation=1◆TikTokhttps://www.tiktok.com/@geographic_chan◆Instagramhttps://www.instagram.com/geographic_chan/◆X（Twitter）https://twitter.com/geographic_chan◆メルカリShops https://mercari-shops.com/shops/qE7EX58BEhjMd6Fezx8mRD?source=shared_link&utm_source=shared_link ◆ジオチャンLINEスタンプ https://line.me/S/sticker/29492659 ◆グッズ(SUZURI)https://suzuri.jp/geochan声 VOICEVOX:ずんだもん 音読さんこの動画は以下の映像を使用しています。 MEGALODON Este În VIAȚĂ?! Acest Monstru Trâiește În... © 2022 RED ZEBRA https://youtu.be/849wQ2EhHfk The Megalodon The Biggest Prehistoric Shark That Terrorized the Oceans © 2019 Fallen https://youtu.be/D9hC3CeD1AA Species At Risk In Atlantic Canada – White Shark © 2022 Canada Science and Technology Museum https://youtu.be/drplYgwP2MQ Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ For Any Copyright Concerns, Contact Us at our email address yo9636979@gmail.com We will act upon your query immediately. 参考 https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-022-30528-9
thumb.last_res_body: またテメェらのし... メガロドンｖｓホ... いまもいろんなサ... なるほど 空飛ぶサメから逃... ちょうど切らしてた カッケー でかい 説明不要 ...
